mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(start_time, end_time, user_email, room_seq, inserted_time) VALUES(#{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{user_email}, #{room_seq}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION.*, STORE.store_name as store_name, ROOM.room_name as room_name, ROOM.representing_image_extension as representing_image_extension, ROOM.directory_name as directory_name, ROOM.store_email as store_email, ROOM.price_per_hour as price_per_hour FROM RESERVATION, ROOM, STORE WHERE RESERVATION.room_seq = ROOM.room_seq AND ROOM.store_email = STORE.email AND user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.delete: DELETE t_reservation, t_payment FROM RESERVATION t_reservation INNER JOIN PAYMENT t_payment WHERE t_reservation.reservation_seq = t_payment.reservation_seq AND t_payment.payment_method = 'yet' AND t_reservation.inserted_time < DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 15 MINUTE) AND t_reservation.reservation_seq = #{reservation_seq}
